p: This retrospective cohort study includes all consecutive patients affected by EVD hospitalized in two ETCs in Sierra Leone, from 19/09/2014 to 12/12/2014 in the Lakka Holding and Treatment Centre and from 12/12/2014 to 28/05/2015 in the Goderich ETC-ICU. Both ETCs were located near Freetown, Sierra Leone. More detailed information on the staff, facility, and operational procedures are provided in the Supplementary Material, S1 and S2. The main characteristics and differences are reported in TableÂ 1.
